trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_SEQ_00<tab>Rukusa Farusa seems to be near the end of his tethers.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_SEQ_01<tab>Nearly inchoate with anger, Rukusa Farusa tells you that Godbert the goldsmith has swooned from the heat of the bath. See if a determined /poke will rouse him.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_SEQ_02<tab>Godbert remains insensate despite the potent prod. Do as the physicians do and douse him with a bottle of ice-cold lake water.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_SEQ_03<tab>Godbert does not respond. This calls for another dose of ice-cold lake water.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_SEQ_04<tab>Godbert stirs ever so slightly. Perhaps another dose of ice-cold lake water will do the trick.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_SEQ_05<tab>Godbert has regained his foot with surprising alacrity. How efficacious these tricks of physicking are! Report the happy development to Rukusa Farusa.

TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_SEQ_06<tab>Godbert is homebound, a man reborn. Rukusa Farusa ponders over how a man may be a figure both comic and tragic. Godbert has left you a precious ring, a strangely moving memento of the Calamity. Wear it with humility.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_TODO_00<tab>Give Godbert a firm /poke.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_TODO_01<tab>Dump the freezing lake water on Godbert.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_TODO_02<tab>Dump the freezing lake water on Godbert again.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_TODO_03<tab>Dump the freezing lake water on Godbert yet again.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_TODO_04<tab>Report to Rukusa Farusa.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_RUKUSAFARUSA_000_000<tab>First one thing, then another! That goldsmith passed out from too much heat. We have warned him time and again this past week not to stay in so long!

TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_RUKUSAFARUSA_000_001<tab>Honestly, I do not trust myself to tend to this fool, for I've a mind to strangle him. If a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poke<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> revives him not, throw a bucket of lake water on him. There was ice on it this morning!
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_GODBERT_000_010<tab>...
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_GODBERT_000_020<tab>...
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_GODBERT_000_030<tab>Hrrrm...?
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_GODBERT_000_040<tab>Hreee!!! Wrath of Rhalgr, what are you <var 1A 02 /var>doing<var 1A 01 /var>!?
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_GODBERT_000_041<tab>Oh, it's you! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> of strong-yet-tender fingers!

TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_GODBERT_000_042<tab>I was lost, I freely confess it! I came to this retreat an artisan whose craft had lost its savor, enriching myself by indulging customers' grossest tastes. I was ready to suffer privations, and I did! But today...

TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_GODBERT_000_043<tab>Several hours into the ordeal of the scalding water, my life flashed before my eyes. There, I saw forms exquisite─filigree masks, steel cut to shine like diamonds, graceful galleries of electrum where emeralds took the air with pearly suitors... I must return to Ul'dah, to my workshop!
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_RUKUSAFARUSA_000_050<tab>Our goldsmith has departed for home, I am glad to say. He left you this ring─a token of his appreciation, he says.
TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_RUKUSAFARUSA_000_051<tab>The stone is taken from a fragment of Dalamud itself, created in abiding faith that out of the worst may come beauty.

TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_RUKUSAFARUSA_000_052<tab>It sounded as though he lost something─or someone─in the Calamity. “The ring is the only thing I have made in the last five years,” he said, “and now I would like <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to have it.” Extraordinary.

TEXT_GAIUSB412_00868_RUKUSAFARUSA_000_053<tab>A very unexpected turn of events, I must say. I still think him utterly mad, but no doubt he is a more fascinating one. I don't suppose he'd have given me the ring even if I'd... Well, no use fretting over a song already sung.
